subtasks: Assess crotch angles and trim branches with angles less than 90 degrees
Remove branches causing shading to other limbs
Trim central leaders to desired angle
Remove crisscrossing branches and those at risk of rubbing
Clean pruning tools between trees to prevent disease spread
Open up tree canopy to promote sunlight penetration and fruit growth
Gather and present safety equipment (e.g., pistol, holster)
Explain personal safety precautions while working in the orchard
Discuss local wildlife management (e.g., coyote activities on the farm)
Demonstrate the use of a custom holster for carrying a firearm
